title: Side-by-side tables
text:
Use the layout-ncol chunk option to organize output in columns, i.e., layout-ncol: 2 for two table side-by-side.

```{r}
#| layout-ncol: 2

library(knitr)

# table on the left
kable(head(mtcars[, 1:3]))

# table on the right
kable(head(cars))
```

Options for tables produced by executable code cells

title: About
text:
As part of this project, I will tweet a Quarto tip each day in starting June 28, 2022 for thirty days from my personal account @minebocek with the hashtag #quartotip. The daily tips / tweets are in no particular order. This website will collect each tip as a daily blog post entry. And, you guessed it, it’s made with Quarto!
The target audience for this project is folks who are already somewhat familiar with Quarto. If you’re brand new to Quarto, I recommend getting started here instead.
